pageContext.quote: Remember to conduct yourself in life as if at a banquet.As something being passed around comes to you, reach outyour hand and take a moderate helping. Does it pass you by?Don’t stop it. It hasn’t yet come? Don’t burn in desire forit, but wait until it arrives in front of you. Act this waywith children, a spouse, toward position, with wealth —one day it will make you worthy of a banquet with the gods.
